title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details section displays duplicate names. Additionally, some improvements can be made: i. Validate the name for duplicates on the first page. ii. Merge the first and second columns to improve the layout.
OB: The dialog details section displays duplicate names and the first and second columns are not merged.
EB: The dialog details section should not display duplicate names and the first and second columns should be merged.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog. 2. Change a parameter name to something very long. 3. Observe that the preview of the name is cut off.
